into a certain binyan, that produces a verb that is a mixture of the shoresh and the binyan. For example, the shoresh אכל means "eating," the binyan
has a flavor of "making someone else do something," and so if we put the shoresh אכל into the binyan
we will produce a verb that combines eating and making someone else do something, ie "to make someone else eat," ie to feed them.
